titleStmt.title: A sermon prepared to be preach'd at the internment of the renowned Observator with some remarques on his life, by the Reverend Toryrorydammeeplotshammee Younkercrape : to which is annexed an elegy and epitaph, by the Rose-Ally-Poet, and other prime wits of the age.
titleStmt.author: Younkercrape, Toryrorydammeeplotshammee.
Rose-Ally-Poet.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Langley Curtiss ...,

notesStmt.note: A parody "in Rabelaisian humor with a text from Pantagruel," on the Observator, edited by Sir Roger L'Estrange.--cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
